title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.154 - Initial occupancy expense
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.154 - Initial occupancy expense

State Regulations

All expenses incurred and all income earned related to
patient care accounted for on the accrual basis during the initial occupancy
period, except for: (a) interest
expense and interest income; (b) any additional New York State Housing Finance Agency financing
expense; (c) accounting fees of
outside independent accountants; and
(d) legal fees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.154

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
